name: William “Bill” Jenkin
statement:
**Elected Experience**  
Two terms as 16th District Representative. Elected to Caucus leadership as Deputy Whip. Three years on Prosser School Board, 2 years as School Board President.

**Other Professional Experience**  
Owner, Prosser Vineyard & Winery and Bill’s Tasting Room, Edward Jones Financial Advisor (AAMS), former Farmers Insurance Agent, Real Estate Investor.

**Education**  
B.A. in Business Management, University of Redlands

**Community Service**  
Washington Complete Count Census Committee, State Tourism Marketing Authority, past Rotary District 5060 Governor, Founding Chairman of Prosser Boys & Girls Club, former Prosser Chamber of Commerce President, Prosser Economic Development Association, People for People Board Member, Prosser United Good Neighbor President (2014) and member.

**Statement**  
As your state Representative, I’ve fought in Olympia to make sure our community is heard. Serving on key committees like tourism, international trade, economic development, the census and capital budget, I’ve worked hard promoting our district as a leader and securing the resources it deserves. If elected as your state Senator, I will continue to be an accessible and tireless advocate for you.

The coming years will be a challenge for state government and our district needs the experience I have as an effective representative of the people. A voice for common sense, pragmatic solutions, and conservative values in the Legislature, there's no question about what I will do for our communities because my record speaks for itself.

I will prioritize state spending to reflect our values with existing tax dollars. I will protect water rights for rural communities, continue to stand up for parental rights in education, and work for economic prosperity for all.

I'm proudly endorsed by prosecutors, county commissioners, mayors, sheriffs, and community leaders from across the district, in addition to senators from around the state. Vote Bill Jenkin for 16th District state Senate to ensure we have a tested and effective voice in Olympia.
